properties.title: 695 Never End Freeride
properties.abstract: An absolute flow experience awaits you on the 7 km long freeride trail from Crap Sogn Gion to Laax. The trail is technically demanding.
properties.description:
The Never End is a natural freeride trail, which leads from Crap Sogn Gion down to Laax overcoming 1,100m difference in altitude over a distance of 7km. The top part of the trail, which is above the treeline, is stony and raw. From the treeline onwards the trail consists of soil and roots.
The Never End trail combines northsore elements with nature. You set off from the Laax valley station (1,100m). From there you take the cablecar to the start of the freeride trail. The trail is aimed at intermediate to advanced level riders.
properties.name: Flims Laax Falera
